title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond SFTP and NFS: Automate enterprise file transfers at scale (STG361)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越 SFTP 和 NFS：大规模自动化企业文件传输 (STG361)
abstract: Modern enterprises need flexible file transfer strategies addressing one-time migrations, recurring workflows, and processing-intensive transfers. This session explores comprehensive solutions using AWS Transfer Family and DataSync across these three scenarios. Learn to segment requirements and select appropriate services through real customer stories. We'll cover migration patterns for moving data from on-premises and other clouds, establishing secure recurring workflows, and integrating processing capabilities. Walk away with practical guidance on service selection, reference architectures, and best practices for building unified data movement strategies that scale with your business needs.
abstract_cn: 现代企业需要灵活的文件传输策略来应对一次性迁移、定期工作流和处理密集型传输。本次会议探讨使用 AWS Transfer Family 和 DataSync 在这三种场景下的综合解决方案。通过真实客户案例学习如何细分需求并选择合适的服务。我们将介绍从本地和其他云迁移数据的迁移模式、建立安全的定期工作流以及集成处理能力。您将获得关于服务选择、参考架构和构建可随业务需求扩展的统一数据移动策略的最佳实践的实用指导。
